com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.tablemanager

类 Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.tablemanager.Connector

  • public class Connector
extends java.lang.Object
    The connector to connect database provided by LitePal. Users can use this class to get the instance of SQLiteDatabase. But users still need to write their own CRUD logic by the returned SQLiteDatabase. It will be improved in the future.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0

    • 方法详细资料

      • getWritableDatabase

        public static android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getWritableDatabase()
        Get a writable SQLiteDatabase. There're a lot of ways to operate database in android. But LitePal doesn't support using ContentProvider currently. The best way to use LitePal well is get the SQLiteDatabase instance and use the methods like SQLiteDatabase#save, SQLiteDatabase#update, SQLiteDatabase#delete, SQLiteDatabase#query in the SQLiteDatabase class to do the database operation. It will be improved in the future.
        返回:
        A writable SQLiteDatabase instance

      • getReadableDatabase

        @Deprecated
public static android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getReadableDatabase()
        已过时。 
        Deprecated. Using LitePal.getDatabase() instead.
        返回:
        A readable SQLiteDatabase instance.

      • getDatabase

        public static android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getDatabase()
        Call getDatabase directly will invoke the getWritableDatabase method by default. This is method is alias of getWritableDatabase.
        返回:
        A writable SQLiteDatabase instance

      • clearLitePalOpenHelperInstance

        public static void clearLitePalOpenHelperInstance()
        Never call this method. This is only used by internal.
